content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials + a crochet stitch chart in one printable file without advertisements the aisling crochet motif square is a beautiful granny square design that blends classic stitches with modern flair this versatile square is perfect for blankets bags or joining into larger projects love the aisling granny square make the bag --> https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/aisling-granny-squares-bag **yarn** lion brand yarns 24/7 cotton was used for the 6 granny squares shown in the photos lion brand yarn rewind was used for the larger granny square crochet motif square design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2025 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/aisling-crochet-motif-square/
